lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors guard was feeling better and was on track to return for the N.B.A. finals next week, his father said.
snippet: The Golden State Warriors guard was feeling better and was on track to return for the N.B.A. finals next week, his father said.
abstract: Golden State Warriors guard Klay Thompson is feeling better after displaying 'concussionlike symptoms' after Game 5 of Western Conference finals; must still pass league-mandated concussion protocol before returning to play.
